description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: In bigo_unlocked_ioctl of bigo.c, there is a possible UAF due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

En bigo_unlocked_ioctl de bigo.c, existe un posible UAF debido a una verificación de los límites faltantes. Esto podría conducir a una escalada local de privilegios sin necesidad de permisos de ejecución adicionales. La interacción del usuario no es necesaria para la explotación.
